message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn, I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the decreasing value.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Take the 40% before it shrinks even further.
I'll compromise a bit more, but I won't go below 56%.
Alice, this is your last chance for a decent share. Take it or leave it.
